paragraphs.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender—The Poster Collection (ISBN 1-61655-737-0) is a book published by ${link_0}, featuring twenty posters made by creators ${link_1} and ${link_2}. These artworks are packaged into 12" x 16" prints that can be removed from the book and framed. The book was released on August 4, 2015.
paragraphs.text: Avatar: The Last Airbender—The Poster Collection (ISBN 1-61655-737-0) is a book published by Dark Horse Comics, featuring twenty posters made by creators Bryan Konietzko and Michael Dante DiMartino. These artworks are packaged into 12" x 16" prints that can be removed from the book and framed. The book was released on August 4, 2015.

source.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender—The Poster Collection
